{"id":1194174541,"question_id":125,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1709606095,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"298 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1194174541/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"16.4 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def isPalindrome(self, s):\n        s = s.lower()\n        sanitized = ''\n        for i in range(0, len(s)):\n            if s[i].isalpha() or s[i].isnumeric():\n                sanitized += s[i]\n        left = 0\n        right = len(sanitized) - 1\n        ans = True\n\n        while left < right:\n            if sanitized[left] == sanitized[right]:\n                left += 1\n                right -= 1\n            else:\n                ans = False\n                left += 1\n                right -= 1\n        return ans            ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
